src:
“Chucky” Lozano responde a críticas con gol en Champions | Deportes 06/11/19 | Video
 by Redacción AN / JM



Hirving Lozano respondió a las críticas de una parte de la prensa italiana, así como a la confianza del técnico Carlo Ancelotti, al marcar este martes su tercer gol en Champions League, primero con la camiseta del Napoli; diana que significó el empate de su escuadra 1-1 frente al Salzburgo en el Estadio San Paolo.
text:
"Chucky" Lozano responds to criticism with goal in Champions | Sports 11/06/19 | Video
 by AN / JM Writing



Hirving Lozano responded to the criticism of a part of the Italian press, as well as the confidence of coach Carlo Ancelotti, marking his third goal in the Champions League on Tuesday, first with the Napoli shirt; target that meant the draw of his 1-1 squad against Salzburg at the San Paolo Stadium.
